data.eml:eml: Revision of the Caraphiini, New Tribe (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lepturinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ohbayashi, Nobuo, Lin, Mei-Ying, Yamasako, Junsuke (2016): Revision of the Caraphiini, New Tribe (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Lepturinae). Zootaxa 4084 (2): 187-217, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4084.2.2
